sentences.sentence: Mix a 50/50 solution of isopropyl alcohol and water into a small spray bottle if you've got one—if not, just dab your cloth into the solution.
sentences.translation: 将 50/50 的异丙醇和水混合到一个小喷雾瓶中，如果你有的话——如果没有，就把你的布轻拍入溶液中。

sentences.sentence: Stay samples with clean after cooling isopropyl alcohol cleaning residue flux.
sentences.translation: 待样品冷却后用干净的异丙醇清洗残留助焊剂。

sentences.sentence: Can't use Ding Jirong fiber agent and isopropyl alcohol solution to clean the uv PC board.
sentences.translation: 不可以用丁基溶纤剂和异丙醇溶液来清洗防紫外线的PC板材。
